company_description: Blockchain.com is a cryptocurrency platform that offers digital wallets for storing and transacting with cryptocurrencies, as well as tools for buying, selling, and managing cryptocurrency investments.
founders: Benjamin Reeves, Nicolas Cary, Peter Smith
universities: Newcastle University, University of Puget Sound,
